name: HECK!
description:
A 90's style first person shooter with randomly generated levels. The levels get harder as you go; how far can you get? 

This started as a project for  the  Miz jam 1, so all art assets are originally from the associated sprite pack. I heavily edited and animated some sprites and produced all of the code. I'm using this project as a test run for a larger rouge-lite shooter I am building. Hope you like it!

Music is "Stealth Theme Music" by Jake Embleton from the Unity asset store.
